sentences.sContent: I remember changing cars twice when visiting her bungalow in New Delhi in 1998.
sentences.sContent_eng: I remember changing cars twice when visiting her bungalow in New Delhi in 1998.
sentences.sCn: 我记得1998年去她在新德里的小平房拜访时，中途两次换车。

sentences.sContent: Belinda and Clive, who worked on the railways, moved to a bungalow not far from Barry Island.
sentences.sContent_eng: Belinda and Clive, who worked on the railways, moved to a bungalow not far from Barry Island.
sentences.sCn: 贝琳达和克里夫在铁路工作，并且搬到离巴厘岛不远的一处平房居住。

sentences.sContent: It would never have happened if he had stayed in Australia, for Australia is still the land of the bungalow.
sentences.sContent_eng: It would never have happened if he had stayed in Australia, for Australia is still the land of the bungalow.
sentences.sCn: 要是他居住在澳大利亚的话这种情况绝对不可能发生，因为现在澳大利亚土地上所座落的依然是平房。

trans.tranOther: a house that is all on ground level
